content: two little hearts overlapped and surrounded by kisses form this afghan block which may be finished at 6 9 or 12 for your sampler blanket this pattern started life as an experiment in a design game in the bamcal 2025 group worked in dk on a 4mm hook will give an approximately 9 5 square worsted on a 5 5mm hook will be approximately 12 the final stitch count is 39 there are round by round photographs at the end of the pattern which includes a chart kindly added by jacqui for the two most lengthy rounds and a tick box chart by mermaidwiggle to help keep your place this is my contribution to 2026 crochet block a month cal /groups/2026-crochet-block-a-month-cal and a thread will be available there for help and discussion tested by jacqui lynne p and sandra
